scripts.update:functions:deps: cd functions && npm install firebase-functions@latest firebase-admin@latest && cd ..
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run clean && npm run build -- --configuration production && npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --project production --only hosting:ecommerce-vertex,functions
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run clean && npm run build -- --configuration development && npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --project development --only hosting:ecommerce-vertex,functions
